Jogos FPS livres

(First-person shooter)

Freedoom e PrBoom+ = GPL

freedoom.github.io
prboom-plus.sourceforge.net

Freedoom e PrBoom+ = GPL

Install


sudo apt install freedoom

Hexen II: Hammer of Thyrion = GPL

uhexen2.sourceforge.net

Hexen II: Hammer of Thyrion = GPL

Install


sudo apt install uhexen2
game-data-packager -i hexen2

QuakeSpasm ou ezQuake = GPL

quakespasm.sourceforge.net
ezquake.github.io

QuakeSpasm ou ezQuake = GPL

Install


sudo apt install quake
game-data-packager -i quake

Yamagi Quake II = GPL

www.yamagi.org/quake2

Yamagi Quake II = GPL

Install


sudo apt install quake2
game-data-packager -i quake2

OpenArena = GPL

openarena.ws

OpenArena = GPL

Install


sudo apt install openarena

Alien Arena = GPL

red.planetarena.org

Alien Arena = GPL

Install


sudo apt install alien-arena

Terminal Overload = MIT

www.terminal-overload.org

Terminal Overload = MIT

Install

Não está empacotado no Debian, binários disponíveis para download no site do jogo.

www.terminal-overload.org

Tremulous = GPL

tremulous.net

Nexuiz Classic = GPL

www.alientrap.com/games/nexuiz

Nexuiz Classic = GPL

Install


sudo apt install nexuiz

Xonotic = GPL

www.xonotic.org

Xonotic = GPL

Install

Não está empacotado no Debian, binários disponíveis para download no site do jogo.

www.xonotic.org

Warsow = non-free

warsow.net

Unvanquished = GPL

www.unvanquished.net

Unvanquished = GPL

Install

Não está empacotado no Debian, binários disponíveis para download no site do jogo.

www.unvanquished.net

Cube = ZLIB

cubeengine.com/cube.php

Cube 2 = ZLIB

sauerbraten.org

Cube 2 = ZLIB

Install


sudo apt install sauerbraten

AssaultCube = ZLIB

assault.cubers.net

AssaultCube = ZLIB

Install


sudo apt install assaultcube

Red Eclipse = ZLIB

www.redeclipse.net

Red Eclipse = ZLIB

Install


sudo apt install redeclipse

OpenSpades = GPL

openspades.yvt.jp

worldofpadman.net

Enemy Territory: Legacy = GPL

www.etlegacy.com
